snippet: A federal judge on Friday rejected a last-ditch request from one of Osama bin Laden's sons-in-law to delay his trial after his lawyers said the government may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, with a similar name....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Rejects Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Claim of Mistaken Identity
headline.main: U.S. Judge Rejects Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Claim of Mistaken Identity

lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday rejected a last-ditch request from one of Osama bin Laden's sons-in-law to delay his trial after his lawyers said the government may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, with a similar name.
